page.title: 10West Hill
page.content: West Hill is on the western side of the River Otter.West Hill is over looking Ottery St. Mary.The village is not very flat: it is mainly trees and hills.There are a lot of houses with a lot of retired people living there.Houses there nowadays are very expensive to buy.There is one main shop which is called Potters.Next door is a newsagent.There is a small church which is nearly on the edge of West Hill.There are 2 schools 1 which is private and the other is a primary school.There are not any public swimming pools or parks but some people have their own pool.There are no public houses,or inns,or hotels. West Hill is in the countryside.
